snippet.title: COLONY | Indie Game Story Launch Trailer (தமிழ்)
snippet.description:
COLONY | Indie Game Story Trailer (தமிழ்)
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
About Colony
The Colony game presents players with a gripping first-person horror experience characterised by its spine-chilling atmosphere and intricate puzzle-solving mechanics. The game immerses players in a haunting narrative set within a creepy bungalow, where the primary goal is to unravel the mysteries and escape the clutches of an evil spirit. The eerie environment and unsettling sound design amplify the sense of dread, making each moment in the game both tense and exhilarating. The puzzles are cleverly designed to keep players engaged and strongly connecting with the ghost's personal story. The interaction with a ghost is a key to solving the puzzles and also adds a layer of psychological horror experience.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
